Fostair NEXThaler 100micrograms/dose / 6micrograms/dose dry powder inhaler <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Chiesi Ltd)</ph> 26112111000001106

Beclometasone dipropionate 100 microgram per 1 dose

Formoterol fumarate dihydrate 6 microgram per 1 dose

  • 120 dose POM

    NHS indicative price = £29.32

BECLOMETASONE WITH FORMOTEROL
